conversations.body_text: Hi Alex Hope,    Please check whether the throttle spring and the insulating washer above it are properly installed. Kindly provide photos of the installation area and a video showing the behavior in the software for further analysis.

As I was recording the video the software worked. I pressed back down again
3 seconds later and now it stopped working. I’m unsure of the insulated
washer

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 3:02 AM support@simsonn.com

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 3:10 AM Alex Hope <hopealex347@gmail.com> wrote:  
 
 As I was recording the video the software worked. I pressed back down again 3 seconds later and now it stopped working. I’m unsure of the insulated washer  
 
  
 On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 3:02 AM support@simsonn.com <support@simsonn.com> wrote: 
 
  
	 Hi Alex Hope,  
 
 Please check whether the throttle spring and the insulating washer above it are properly installed. Kindly provide photos of the installation area and a video showing the behavior in the software for further analysis. 
   
     
  On Sat, 5 Jul at 2:52 AM , Alex Hope <hopealex347@gmail.com> wrote:  Throttle does not work

Hi，Alex Hope，  Please install Todesk so I can assist you remotely. It doesn’t require registration. Once installed, simply send me a photo of your ID and temporary password.        https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

Where do i find the id


On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 3:16 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Hope,

it wants me to make an account and I do not understand the
foreign characters

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 3:32 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi，Alex Hope，  You don't need to create an account. Just click the close button in the top right corner to enter the main interface.

ToDesk:
device ID:823 324 755
Temporary password:d58s1krc

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 3:39 AM support@simsonn.com
It stopped working again

It stopped working again

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 4:14 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Alex Hope,    Please plug the throttle into the clutch port, reconnect the USB, and use the Offset function. If the device works normally without stopping, I will send you a replacement main controller.

Ya still not working after offset and clutch. I tried to switch the
throttle and brake and I put the brake usb into the throttle and throttle
into brake. The throttle showed up on the telemetry when hitting the brake
the actual throttle Pedal still showed nothing.

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 4:56 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Alex Hope,  You may need to check the small spring and acrylic part on the throttle pedal to see if they are damaged or incorrectly installed. The correct setup should have the spring positioned between the two screws. I’ll send you a reference image.

Ya it is installed like that

On Sat, Jul 5, 2025 at 5:39 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Alex Hope,  Could you provide a clear photo of the plastic spacer? I need to check if it's in good condition. Also, if plugging the throttle into the brake port doesn’t work, but plugging the brake into the throttle port works fine, then the control box is likely functioning properly.
On Mon, Jul 7, 2025 at 7:14 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Hope,  I'll check it remotely for you again. Since the hardware and sensors are not damaged, the issue is most likely software-related.
Hi，Alex Hope，  I'll send you a replacement throttle sensor — the issue might be caused by a damaged RJ11 cable on the throttle.

Ok thank you cause from what I understand the rest of the setup looks
correct

On Tue, Jul 8, 2025 at 2:47 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Hope,    I’m the engineer. Please provide your ID and temporary password. Once I confirm, I will arrange the replacement parts shipment for you.

Your mean id and password for the screen share

On Tue, Jul 8, 2025 at 3:01 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Alex Hope,  Yes

823324755 2t0e014p

On Tue, Jul 8, 2025 at 3:17 AM support@simsonn.com
Please use a screwdriver to directly press the silver sensor located at the spring area, so I can check if it’s functioning properly.
On Tue, Jul 8, 2025 at 3:52 AM support@simsonn.com
My brake pedal just stopped working it’s never done that

screen share cause my resolution was distorted
Hi Alex Hope,  Regarding this issue, I’ve also replied to you on Amazon. She will be sending you the throttle sensor accessory today.
